full_text: Jeffrey Epstein is currently housed at MCC New York and not in a local hospital as has been reported. As with all inmates, for privacy and security reasons, we do not share information on an inmate's medical status or their conditions of confinement. Thanks Office of Public Affairs Information, Policy and Public Affairs Division Federal Bureau of Prisons (202) 514-6551 - phone (202) 514-6620 - fax >>> (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) @thedailybeast.com> 7/25/2019 9:44 AM >>> Hello, Reaching out about reports that Jeffrey Epstein tried to kill himself in prison/was injured in someway. (b)(6). (b)(6), (b)(7)(C) Senior Editor, writer The Daily Beast M: 267-257 (b)(6) Facebook, Twitter, Instagram: @ (b)(6), (b)(7)(C)

text_blocks.content: Jeffrey Epstein is currently housed at MCC New York and not in a local hospital as has been reported. As with all inmates, for privacy and security reasons, we do not share information on an inmate's medical status or their conditions of confinement.
Thanks Office of Public Affairs Information, Policy and Public Affairs Division Federal Bureau of Prisons (202) 514-6551 - phone (202) 514-6620 - fax
Reaching out about reports that Jeffrey Epstein tried to kill himself in prison/was injured in someway.

additional_notes: The document contains redactions marked as (b)(6) and (b)(7)(C), indicating withheld information under specific FOIA exemptions.
